column1: Vangaindrano [vaŋɡeɳˈɖʐanʷ] is a city (commune urbaine) in Atsimo-Atsinanana Region

The city is near the mouth of the Mananara River at the southern part of the east coast. It's connected to the north by national road RN 12 top Farafangana that is situated at a distance of 75 km in the North. The road continues south but that section cannot be used by ordinary vehicles
column2: due to its bad condition and lack of bridges. An airport serves the town.

column1: The Midongy Atsimo National Park is situated at 90 km from Vangaindrano and the Manombo Reserve
